machine_extruder_start_code_0.label: Extruder Start G-Code
machine_extruder_start_code_0.description: Start g-code to execute when switching to this extruder.

machine_extruder_start_code_1.label: Extruder Start G-Code
machine_extruder_start_code_1.description: Start g-code to execute when switching to this extruder.
machine_extruder_start_code_1.default_value:
G1 E100 F1200
G92 E0
;Please do not change the upon code

machine_extruder_end_code_0.label: Extruder End G-Code
machine_extruder_end_code_0.description: End g-code to execute when switching away from this extruder.

machine_extruder_end_code_1.label: Extruder End G-Code
machine_extruder_end_code_1.description: End g-code to execute when switching away from this extruder.
machine_extruder_end_code_1.default_value:
G1 X{prime_tower_position_x_nep2d} Y{prime_tower_position_y_nep2d} E-100 F5000
G92 E0

machine_extruder_end_code_2.label: Extruder End G-Code
machine_extruder_end_code_2.description: End g-code to execute when switching away from this extruder.
